suite.name: Tastyigniter Edit Invalid

kw.name: Open Browser And Go Directly To My Account
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Navigate To First Working Account URL
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Fail
kw.arg: Could not reach My Account page using any candidates: ${ACCOUNT_CANDIDATES}
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.
Iterate through known account URLs; stop at the first that loads the form.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Login, then hit account page directly (bypasses dropdown/hover entirely).

test.name: Missing First Name → Shows Required Message

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of the text-input-element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.arg: The First Name field is required.

kw.arg: The First Name field is required.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot

test.doc: Clear First Name; expect “The First Name field is required.” (if validation exists). Otherwise log known issue.

suite.doc: Edit My Account – Negative validation tests (direct navigation; no dropdown).
